attributes.action: Sack three civil servants related to HBOS  billions
attributes.additional_details: The £20 Billion pound loss of wealth at HBOS was not entirely in the hands of 3 directors. Rather, a number of very high FSA/Treasury/BOE senior civil servants will have looked the other way over the years. The Cabinet needs to publicize where these employee's are and that they have been removed from positions where oversight and monitoring is required or having outright sacked them for "gross incompetence."
